32 #ifndef HAL_HW_INTERFACE_HAL_ROS_LOGGING_H
33 #define HAL_HW_INTERFACE_HAL_ROS_LOGGING_H
34 
35 #include <hal.h>
36 #include <ros/console.h>
37 
38 #define HAL_ROS_LOG(hal_lev, ros_lev, name, ...) \
39  do \
40  { \
41  ROS_##ros_lev##_NAMED(name, __VA_ARGS__); \
42  hal_print_msg(RTAPI_MSG_##hal_lev, __VA_ARGS__); \
43  } while (0)
44 
45 #define HAL_ROS_LOG_DBG(name, ...) HAL_ROS_LOG(DBG, DBG, name, __VA_ARGS__)
46 
47 #define HAL_ROS_LOG_INFO(name, ...) HAL_ROS_LOG(INFO, INFO, name, __VA_ARGS__)
48 
49 #define HAL_ROS_LOG_ERR(name, ...) HAL_ROS_LOG(ERR, ERROR, name, __VA_ARGS__)
50 
51 #endif // HAL_HW_INTERFACE_HAL_ROS_LOGGING_H
